item.title: Vitalik retweeted the "Ethereum 10 Years of Zero Downtime, Zero Maintenance" tweet.
item.description: On July 27th, Vitalik Buterin retweeted on the X platform: "Ethereum has been continuously online for ten years with zero downtime and zero maintenance. In contrast, Facebook was down for 14 hours. Cloudflare abandoned 19 data centers. Other Layer 1 networks have encountered multiple issues. Ethereum will never cease. Whether it's a fork, a crash, a bubble, a lawsuit, a hack, or any other dramatic event that the internet may bring about, despite bank failures and the need for server patches, Ethereum continues to operate."

item.title: Believe Founder: Full details of the Ecosystem Flywheel Mechanism to be Announced Tomorrow
item.description: On July 27th, Ben Pasternak, the founder of the token issuance platform Believe, stated on the X platform, "For a currency to achieve long-term success, it requires a flywheel. Believe allows any creator to effortlessly integrate it into their token." "Full details will be disclosed tomorrow." Perhaps due to this news, LAUNCHCOIN rebounded by more than 18% today, and its market value is now $95.45 million.

item.title: Michael Saylor has released Bitcoin Tracker information, hinting at a potential BTC accumulation strategy.
item.description: On July 27th, the founder of Strategy, Michael Saylor, once again released information related to the Bitcoin Tracker and stated, "It all started with a quarter billion in bitcoin."Following the typical pattern, Strategy always discloses information about its additional Bitcoin purchases on the day following the release of relevant news.

item.title: Guangfa Securities: Stablecoins Will Drive the RMB's Global Payment Activity to New Heights
item.description: On July 27th, Guosen Securities released a research report indicating that the global retail cross-border payment market is projected to reach $39.9 trillion in 2024. According to the forecast of FXC Intelligence, this value will rise to $64.5 trillion by 2032, with a compound annual growth rate of 6.2% from 2024 to 2032. In the business hierarchy of RMB cross-border settlement and multi-currency settlement, third-party payment institutions have been deeply integrated into the payment full-chain service ecosystem and are playing a significant role.It is anticipated that stablecoins will drive the global expansion of RMB cross-border payment infrastructure and the diversification of application scenarios. Consequently, the revenue growth space for third-party payment companies is promising. (Daily Economic News)

item.title: Jup Studio's ecosystem meme coin Uranus has surpassed a market capitalization of $60 million, with a 24-hour price increase of over 230%.
item.description: On July 27th, based on the market information from GMGN, the market capitalization of Uranus, the ecosystem meme coin of Jup Studio, has exceeded $60 million and is currently at $62.86 million. It has seen a price increase of more than 230% in the past 24 hours and a trading volume of over $17.7 million during the same period.Possibly due to this situation, Jup Studio's market share on the Solana launchpad briefly exceeded 4% and moved up to the third position in the ranking.BlockBeats reminds users that meme coin prices are highly volatile and investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: SUI Surpasses $4.28, With Over 5% 24-hour Growth
item.description: On July 27th, based on HTX market data, SUI has exceeded $4.28 and is currently trading at $4.281, showing a 24-hour increase of more than 5%.

item.title: Last year, the whale used a flash loan to accumulate WBTC with an average price of $69,162. One hour ago, they deposited 50 WBTC to Binance for profit-taking.
item.description: July 27th. Based on Ashes Monitoring, a whale/institution that borrowed in a loop and purchased a cumulative total of 1,495 WBTC during the period from July to November 2024 continuously transferred out 50 WBTC ($5.9 million) to Binance one hour ago for profit-taking.It purchased 1,495 WBTC using a loop borrowing method in the second half of last year at an average price of $69,162 ($103 million). Starting from March of this year, it has been gradually transferring WBTC to Binance in batches to sell and withdraw USDC for repayment. Up to now, it has sold 923 WBTC ($92.26 million) at an average price of $99,957. It still holds 553.8 WBTC ($65.51 million).Its total profit on WBTC is currently as high as $55.62 million: $28.42 million realized profit from the sold portion and $27.20 million unrealized profit from the unsold portion.

item.title: If Ethereum breaks $3900, the mainstream CEX cumulative short liquidation pressure will reach 740 million.
item.description: On July 27th, according to Coinglass data, if Ethereum surpasses $3900, the cumulative short liquidation intensity on mainstream CEXs will amount to 740 million.Conversely, if Ethereum drops below $3700, the cumulative long liquidation intensity on mainstream CEXs will reach 1.528 billion.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not display the exact number of contracts to be liquidated or the precise value of contracts to be liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the relative significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to the adjacent liquidation cluster, that is, intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what degree the target price will be influenced when it reaches a particular position. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that when the price reaches that level, it will experience a more intense reaction due to a liquidity avalanche.

item.title: Chinese Bank Former President: Stablecoin Has an Innovative Role in Facilitating Finance, But Also Poses Systemic Financial Risks
item.description: On July 27th, Li Lihui, the former President of Bank of China, stated at the "2025 International Monetary Forum" that stablecoins play a role in providing innovative financial convenience while also presenting systemic financial risks.He noted that the United States hopes to link stablecoins to the US dollar in order to maintain its global currency hegemony. If the United States fails to improve its twin deficits, it may have an impact on the stability of its currency value. Additionally, he pointed out that Hong Kong's stablecoin can relax domestic access conditions when the appropriate conditions are met, which will assist in the internationalization of the RMB.He also emphasized the need to monitor the dynamics of the decentralized financial market represented by the United States and enhance China's position in the global monetary and financial system.

item.title: JPMorgan Securities Submits Application to Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission for Virtual Asset Service License
item.description: On July 27th, Fusang Financial disclosed that its indirectly wholly-owned subsidiary, Fusang Securities Limited, submitted an application to the Securities and Futures Commission of Hong Kong on July 25, 2025. The purpose of this application is to obtain a Type 1 (Securities Trading) regulated activity license in accordance with the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Chapter 571 of the Laws of Hong Kong) in order to provide virtual asset trading and/or advisory services as an intermediary. (Sohu Finance)
